course_title: Special Topics: Content Marketing Digital Age
class_notes:
You've spent a lot of time learning how to arrive at the Answer. This course provides training on how to Tell others.
The Content Marketing course is useful for anyone that needs to present to a stakeholder:
-	marketer communicating to consumers
-	consultant communicating to a client 
-	an entrepreneur communicating to investors
-	a non-profit communicating to donors
We live in a noisy world -- the average person encounters 6,000-10,000 ads in a single day, 27M pieces of content are published daily and our attention spans have perfected the art of tuning out. Becoming a compelling storyteller is your best chance to break through.
The course will explore how we make ideas sticky using examples ranging from Hollywood movies to world-class brands like Peloton. Once we build a foundation for becoming effective communicators we'll examine the biggest digital platforms of the day (FB/IG, TikTok, Podcasts).
